summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4756 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Northeast, from Railroad Avenue Northeast to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55022, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
